meanings.definition: A group of atoms derived from alkanes by the removal of one hydrogen atom.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the alphyls in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The alphyls threw a party in the molecule.
meanings.sent4: The alphyls danced around the carbon atoms.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the alphyls looked like tiny building blocks.

meanings.definition: A chemical compound containing an alkyl group.
meanings.sent1: She mixed the alphyls into the solution.
meanings.sent2: The alphyls reacted with the other compounds.
meanings.sent3: The alphyls were the life of the chemical reaction.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas spread through the lab like alphyls in a compound.
meanings.sent5: The alphyls added a unique touch to the formula.

meanings.sent1: The alphyls in nature play important roles.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use alphyls to enhance plant growth.
meanings.sent3: The alphyls in the forest whispered secrets to the trees.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity spread through the group like alphyls in a molecule.
meanings.sent5: The alphyls in the soil enriched the earth for new growth.
